content: tighter cuff is desired use a smaller size needle while knitting the cuff only or use the alternate ribbed cuff* directions loosely cast on 42 stitches and distribute over three double-point needles so that there are 22 stitches on the first needle and 10 stitches on each of the remaining two needles join for working in the round being careful not to twist stitches place a removable marker to indicate the beginning of the round work in stockinette stitch for 5 rounds work in k1 p1 rib for 2 rounds *alternate ribbed cuff skip the 5 rounds of stockinette stitch and work 7 rounds of k1 p1 rib the heel the heel will be worked back and forth over the first 22 stitches of the round these are all the stitches on the first needle note that all slipped stitches are slipped as if to purl when working on the right side rs slip the stitches with yarn held to the back when working on the wrong side ws slip the stitches with yarn held in front the heel flap with the right side of the sock facing you work the following heel row 1 rs sl1 k1 11 times turn heel row 2 ws sl1 p21 turn repeat these two row an additional 12 times 13 times total 26 total row the heel turn with the right side of the sock facing you work the following row 1 rs sl1 k12 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 5 rs sl1 k8 ssk k1 turn row 6 ws sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn row 7 rs sl1 k10 ssk k1 turn row 8 ws sl1 p11 p2tog p1 turn there are now 14 heel stitches remaining  2011 dabberdesigns@gmail com travel socks v1 0 docx page 2 of 4 the gusset pick up gusset stitches and return to knitting in the round as follows slip all of the instep stitches the stitches on the remaining two needles together onto one needle remember to slip them purlwise set-up round with rs facing you k7 heel stitches with a new needle k7 remaining heel stitches with this same needle pick up and knit 14 stitches along edge of heel flap with a new needle k20 instep stitches with a new needle pick up and knit the 14 stitches along other edge of heel flap with this same needle k7 heel stitches place the removable stitch marker at this point to indicate the new beginning of the round there are now a total of 62 stitches 42 sole stitches 21 per needle and 20 instep stitches round 1 knit all stitches round 2 knit until 3 stitches remain on the first needle k2tog k1 knit all the stitches on the next needle on the remaining needle k1 ssk knit to the end of the needle two gusset stitches have been decreased
